title: La scienza in cucina e l’arte di mangiar bene
author: Pellegrino Artusi
notes: Often credited with stitching together a national Italian cuisine after unification; hugely popular.

title: Il talismano della felicità
author: Ada Boni
notes: 20th-century household staple; defining compendium for Italian home cooks.

title: Le Guide Culinaire
author: Auguste Escoffier
notes: Codified classical French haute cuisine; adopted as professional standard.

title: 1080 recetas de cocina
author: Simone Ortega; Inés Ortega
notes: Mass-market Spanish 'bible' of home cooking; millions sold, household standard.
